message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11500. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  The product is worth a lot to me, and I'm confident it's worth more than $10000 to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $10500? This is a good compromise that will make us both happy.
